title: Oshiete! Galko-chan
alternative_title: Please tell me! Galko-chan, おしえて! ギャル子ちゃん
description: Follow the daily school life of Gyaruko-chan, Otako, and Ojyo in this series of comedic short stories. Gyaruko-chan has a tendency to speak rudely, but she's basically friends with everyone. Otako is the quiet loner of the class, but she is good friends with Gyaruko-chan. Ojyo speaks her mind freely and naturally.
